data.feedback: Well-designed Flutter Foundation epic with correct file paths, sound architecture following SOLID principles, and appropriate scope for Epic 1 of 9. All files to modify exist, files to create don't exist yet. Minor API endpoint naming discrepancies are cosmetic and can be fixed in later epics.
suggestions: Update api_endpoints.dart to match actual backend routes (/auth/me instead of /auth/logout)
Verify import path for LocalStorageImpl in app.dart
